title: Why Your Next iPhone Might Unfold: Apple's $1,800 Gamble on Foldable Future
description: Apple's first foldable iPhone is no longer a matter of "if" but "when"—and that "when" appears to be fall 2026. After nearly a decade of patents and speculation, the iPhone Fold is finally moving from Cupertino's labs to production lines. Ming-Chi Kuo reports…
